message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is a special opportunity for you, considering its value to you is $12,000. I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I value the product at $12,000,  $11,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $10,500, which is still a good deal for you considering your value of $10,000. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. Considering the value of the product to you and my position, I would like to propose a price of $11,000. I believe this offers a fair compromise for both parties involved.
